text: Ah Cool! I'm still not sure what to make of the plate! :sweat_smile::grin: Sorry! It's the same as the one above right? Is this for a moving shot? I haven't done too much matchmoving or vfx work really, looking forward to seeing more of this!

Oh i re-sent it because on my phone it shows as though it wasn’t sent the first time :sweat_smile: probably bug on the app. And it’s for a moving shot, i have already tracked it and imported the point cloud into Maya, the tracking works like a charm, just need to replace the placeholder with the newly textured air-condition , light it and then render in passes  and do some post production in Nuke :relaxed:

Oh right! Yeah I'm looking on chrome at work xD Nice! What did you use to track it, Nuke? I've only used after effects before, was pretty fun! Did some infographics for a safety video for bus drivers haha! I've used the point cloud data too (someone else tracked that) Was reeeally cool to see. Is this part of a larger project or an exercise of it's own?

<http://www.polarmedia.co.uk/> this was the first place I worked! Still some of the stuff that I did in the reel :smile: was a lot of fun! A lot of places like this will hire generalists, so it's really worthwhile to pick up all these extra skills :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: Polar Media | Award Winning Film & 3D Animation
attachments.text: Polar Media is an independent production company based in London, UK and Perth, Australia. We produce films, 3D animation, VR & AR for TV, corporate and the music industry.
attachments.fallback: Polar Media | Award Winning Film & 3D Animation

text: When I finished uni and was looking for my first job I had a lot of comments that tried to steer me away from selling myself as a generalist which made me quite paranoid about it! We're a very useful, and fairly rare type though so keep at it :smile:
